subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Vikings’ Brett Favre looked old, dazed and beaten in his latest (last?) comeback that ended in the second quarter when Corey Wootton slammed him to the icy turf.
snippet: The Vikings’ Brett Favre looked old, dazed and beaten in his latest (last?) comeback that ended in the second quarter when Corey Wootton slammed him to the icy turf.
